title: Club President

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Extra Tip- (Night) Target a player, giving them Basic Defense and Roleblock immunity for the night.
Tee Off!- (Night) [Cheat] Target a non-Cog. If they do not post at least 20 times in the next Day Phase, you will hit them with a Powerful Attack at the end of the day. If the target is otherwise prevented from speaking, this ability will fail.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-A player who is Teed Off which not be informed of it.
-If a player is killed by Tee Off!, that ability/your role will not be included in the death message.

desc:
Post 4028
*Next time, ask your friends ‘fore’ help.*
